4 Year CPS Extended Protection Plan Whether it’s part of your home entertainment system, or simply for watching movies and shows, people enjoy watching TV. However, sometimes accidents can occur that can break, or drastically impact the performance of the TV. This includes dropping the TV while moving or mounting, and kids hitting or knocking the TV over. It even protects you from burn-in, something not typically covered by the OEM. Plus, if something happens to your remote control, you can ask for a hot swap replacement without question. 4 Year Extended Protection Features Accidental Damage coverageImpact DamageDropping while moving or mounting the TVFrom kids playing ball in the houseBurn in covered - usually not covered by the OEMRemote Control replacement - hot swap, no question askedTech Support Included - initial product setup and/or configurationAuthorized service dispatched by Consumer Priority Service

OVERVIEW: Artwork, shows, movies and memories—display what you love on the picture frame-like TV. On The Frame, see everything on the QLED 4K TV at 100% Color Volume with Quantum Dot that saturates your screen with a billion colors. Switch on Art Mode and transform your TV into your own personal art exhibit. With Anti-Reflection and the Matte Display, it’s easy on the eyes. Customize The Frame with a stylish bezel to fit your décor and hang it flush against the wall to look just like the real thing. Anti-Reflection with Matte Display Your artwork or your favorite show will look as good in the morning as it does at night with the lights on. Anti-Reflection technology and the Matte Display Film premium matte finish limit light distraction on your screen by reducing the effects of glare. QLED 4K TV with 100% Color Volume Bask in a billion shades of brilliant color at 100% Color Volume. Quantum Dot technology brings you a gorgeous picture by transforming light into vivid color that stays true for bold detail, even as the scene brightens. Art Mode Enjoy your personal art exhibit when you’re not watching TV. Just switch on Art Mode. When the TV’s off, The Frame becomes a display of your art collection, thanks to the built-in motion sensor. Curate your own photos and art or choose from Art Store, with more than 1,400 new and classic works of art from world-class museums and galleries. Plus, complement your images with matting options to take your art experience to the next level. Slim-Fit Wall Mount Included Hang The Frame flush against the wall to look like an actual picture frame. Made to appear like the real thing, the TV has a Slim Fit WallMount; included will all The Frame purchases keeps it as close to the surface as possible. For the ultimate in decor, limit the cable clutter to just the One Invisible Connection cable that goes to the Slim One Connect box to keep all eyes on what’s on actual display. Customizable Frame Complement your style with the Customizable Bezel for The Frame. Pick the bezel type and color to fit you home décor, and simply snap it on. Choose from Modern or Beveled designs in several different colors.Since it’s magnetic, it’s easy to change when the mood or inspiration strikes. Quantum HDR Go beyond HDTV with Quantum HDR that delivers an expanded range of color and contrast. Step up to the brilliant possibilities of what your picture can bring you. Art Store With a subscription to Samsung’s Art Store, you have unlimited access to a library of over 1,400 new and classic pieces of art from established and emerging artists. Samsung Collection It’s easy to upload your own photography, family portraits and other memories to The Frame from your phone or a USB flash drive. And with 6GB of storage in My Collection, you’ve got lots of room to share masterpieces of your own making. Motion Sensor Intelligent motion sensors help you maximize energy efficiency. Set up your art to display when you’re in the room, and turn off when you’re not. *Motion Sensor operates only in Art Mode. Performance may vary depending on the lighting condition. Smart TV Powered by Tizen Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away.

Powered by Tizen Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away. QLED 4K TV with 100% Color Volume Bask in a billion shades of brilliant color at 100% Color Volume. Quantum Dot technology brings you a gorgeous picture by transforming light into vivid color that stays true for bold detail, even as the scene brightens. Style and personalize art The Frame transforms to art when you're not watching TV. Choose from the Samsung Collection or upload your own pieces to reflect your personality. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is so amazing, just thumbing through the pictures, my own museum. I live across the lake from Mr. Gates and have been told he has a fantastic collection of art works on his tv all for an incredible cost/value. Mine, less than first 4 digits of his “museum”! Less cost, not quite as valuable but stunningly available to look at. I can’t take mine with me but neither can he!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Incredible TV. The install was very involved but the result was great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome TV, love the picture display feature!
reviews.reviewText: This TV is incredibly thin, probably 1/2-3/4” It sits so nicely against the wall and allows you to choose pictures to display when tv is not on. It actually looks like a portrait. The picture quality is great. There was initially a sound delay but it may have been a streaming service we used because it seems to be improved. Have only had this for 2 weeks and we are still getting used to the features and deciding whether we want to use a sound bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrific picture but quality out of the box is unacceptable
reviews.reviewText: The picture on the TV when working correctly is amazing. The interface is really easy to use as well. I received the first TV and the entire screen was shattered out of the box. I processed a return and received a second one within a week. I now have a broken pixel line running vertically down the screen. it would be a great product if there were not quality issues right out of the box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Over all I like
reviews.reviewText: Over all I like the tv. The picture is great on it and the art mode is exactly what I wanted so it didn’t just look like a tv above my fire place. However I should have done a better job with reading up on it. For one it does not just plug into the wall it has an external box that it has to plug into which is quite big. I had a plug put in the fire place for plugging in a tv but once I got it I realized that was not going to happen. I was considering sending it back because the whole point of the tv was to look like a picture and wires going around the wall was not going to do it. Fortunately my husband and I figured out how to run it behind the stone from one plug to another. Definitely keep that in mind if you are going to put it on the wall and don’t want to see wire. Also this one didn’t come with a frame which I was aware of when I bought it but dang those things are expensive. I definitely feel like it needs one for the full affect so I will be buying one soon. Just some things to keep in mind before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our new family room
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is excellent on this TV. We set it up last night and are still learning all the features. I'm not the techy, but so far, my husband and son seem to love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We added the gold frame and it really looks like a picture. We have 2 now as one was to big for the space. Decided to keep both. Ones hanging in our bedroom now.
